quotes: Receiving the Padma Bhushan from President Pratibha Patil: 2009.
We have never had conscription in India, just volunteers.
Add to that the happenings in our immediate neighborhood as in Pakistan and Burma for example and briefly in Bangladesh where military dictatorships had assumed charge.

We have been, by and large, so obsessed with Pakistan that we tend to forget that in the days to come it is China that is going to be our greatest rival in the neighborhood.
They have a lot to deal with—the US, Japan, Russia, and possibly even Vietnam, being higher up than India.
